overview:
Giacomo Balli is an iOS entrepreneur and freelance developer. Originally from Florence, Italy he recently relocated to san Francisco, CA.

The passion for creating apps and coming up with new ways of solving problems allowed him to release over 50 personal projects in the AppStore in addition to all the apps commissioned by companies.

Giacomo also has a deep appreciation for PhoneGap (aka Cordova).

Currently Giacomo focuses on developing his own concepts and helping early stage startups get on their feet with an app.

Occasionally he also engages in AppStore and mobile industry consulting for big companies.
